summary: SummaryEucerin Radiant Tone Cleansing Gel is a face cleanser formulated with 2% Exfoliating AHA Complex that reveals even, smooth and radiant looking skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrating cleanser gently removes built up layers of dead skin, leaving skin looking instantly radiantImproves skin's clarity and boosts skin's radiance with regular use of this facial cleanserFeaturesGel cleanser that's gentle enough for daily useClinically proven formulaKey IngredientsFormulated with 2% Exfoliating AHA (Alpha Hydroxy Acid) Complex combining Lactic Acid and Glycolic Acid to gently exfoliateItem 2634614How To UseAdding Eucerin Radiant Tone Cleansing Gel into your regular skincare routine is easy. Simply pump the facial wash onto your fingertips, massage over wet face and neck, and rinse thoroughly. The clinically proven formula is gentle enough to use as a daily hydrating face wash. Limit the collective use of Radiant Tone products to four times daily.Precautions: Keep out of reach of children. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.IngredientsWater, Alcohol Denat., Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Glycerin, Coco-Betaine, Lactic Acid, SodiumChloride, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Glycolic Acid, Glyceryl Glucoside, Sodium Hydroxide, SodiumBenzoate.
how_to_use: Adding Eucerin Radiant Tone Cleansing Gel into your regular skincare routine is easy. Simply pump the facial wash onto your fingertips, massage over wet face and neck, and rinse thoroughly. The clinically proven formula is gentle enough to use as a daily hydrating face wash. Limit the collective use of Radiant Tone products to four times daily.Precautions: Keep out of reach of children. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I use this everyday and I love it. I finally found something that doesn't dry out my face but also gets the job done!

reviews.headline: Not as expected
reviews.comments: I am very disappointed in these eucerin products. It made my face very dry and it burns when I apply the products. I use the regular eucerin cream and it helps. So I was surprised that these products did the opposite.

reviews.headline: Eucerin cleansing gel
reviews.comments: This does have a burning sensation at first few days and then it stops . This is exfoliating and a cleanser all in one just need one small pump for your whole face and neck. This smooths and makes your skin soft and clean .

reviews.headline: wonderful
reviews.comments: This is great for my skin which is combined oily/dry and my daughter's acne prone skin.

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser
reviews.comments: I have never loved a cleanser more than this one. I use this as my second cleanse every night and have definitely noticed that my face appears to be brighter and even toned.

reviews.headline: It Just Meh
reviews.comments: It hasn't broken out my skin but it also hasn't don't anything for my sunspots or old acne dark areas. It doesn't lather but my face feels clean after use but a little tight from the harsher chemicals. I will use up but not purchase again.

reviews.headline: Be careful ?
reviews.comments: The scent is neutral, the consistency is gentle. But it didn't work for my skin at all. It left my skin soft but super irritated, red as if I'd been sunburned. I thought it was because of the hot water, so I gave it another try and the same thing happened; my skin became more irritated. It may be a good product, but not for sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: It is a bit strong
reviews.comments: Does not appear to be for daily use.  I found after two days, I developed tiny blisters on my face.  It has not lessened the dark spots either.

reviews.headline: So excited about this!
reviews.comments: Ive been searching for a more affordable face wash to switch to that doesnt dry my skin out OR leave a feeling of a weird film. Ive finally found it! This face wash is great and does exactly as advertised. Some people complain about the smell, and I can understand it bc when you open the bottle it kind of smells like hand sanitizer but thats what you get with unfragranced products and I dont even notice the smell when I use it in the shower.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I am happy to help you with a review on Eucerin Radiant Tone Cleansing Gel! I will try my best to provide a balanced and informative review, keeping in mind the principles you have asked me to follow.

Eucerin Radiant Tone Cleansing Gel is a facial cleanser that is formulated to gently cleanse the skin while also helping to improve the appearance of uneven skin tone. It contains ingredients such as glycerin and beta-hydroxy acid (BHA) to help moisturize and exfoliate the skin, respectively.

One of the things I like about this cleanser is that it is fragrance-free and oil-free, which makes it a good option for people with sensitive skin or oily skin. It has a gel-like texture that lathers slightly when you mix it with water, and it rinses off easily, leaving the skin feeling clean and refreshed.

The BHA in the cleanser (salicylic acid) is a chemical exfoliant that can help to unclog pores and reduce the appearance of acne. It can also help to improve the appearance of uneven skin tone
faceoff_positive.headline: good

faceoff_negative.comments:
I recently tried the Eucerin Radiant Tone Cleansing Gel, and overall, I'm impressed with its performance. Designed to gently exfoliate and brighten the skin, this cleanser features a 2% AHA Complex, which includes lactic acid and glycolic acid to remove dead skin cells and improve skin clarity.

Pros:

✅ Gentle Yet Effective Exfoliation – The AHAs work well to refresh the skin without feeling overly harsh. My skin felt smooth and clean after each use.
✅ Improves Radiance – After a few weeks of use, I noticed my complexion looked brighter and more even-toned. It seems to help with dullness and mild discoloration.
✅ Lightweight Gel Texture – It lathers well and rinses off easily, leaving no residue.
✅ Suitable for Most Skin Types – While it provides light exfoliation, it didn't irritate my sensitive skin, which is a plus.

Cons:

❌ Can Be Slightly Drying – If you have dry skin, you might want to follow up with a good moist
faceoff_negative.headline: Works well a bit drying
